channel.title: Jay Leno on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jay Leno Criticizes Political Late-Night Hosts: “Nobody Wants to Hear a Lecture”
item.description: The former ‘Tonight Show’ host took aim at partisan late-night shows in a recent interview: “Why shoot for just half an audience?”
